pkgmetadata.longdescription: Digital PCR Analysis // Analysis, visualisation and simulation of digital polymerase chain reaction (dPCR) (Burdukiewicz et al. (2016) doi:10.1016/j.bdq.2016.06.004). Supports data formats of commercial systems (Bio-Rad QX100 and QX200; Fluidigm BioMark) and other systems.
